thread.title: Stephanie Davis unfollowed Jeremy McConnell on social media - and here's why
thread.title_full: Stephanie Davis unfollowed Jeremy McConnell on social media - and here's why

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Stephanie Davis unfollowed Jeremy McConnell on social media - and here's why
text:
Stephanie Davis and Jeremy Mcconnell (Photo: WENN.com/FameFlynet) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Stephanie Davis reportedly unfollowed Jeremy McConnell over his plans for a reality TV comeback on Ex On The Beach. 
The former Hollyoaks actress met the tattooed star - with whom she shares baby Caben-Albi - during their time on Celebrity Big Brother , and they recently appeared to have bonded over parenthood despite a public row before the birth. 
Now, she has unfollowed her ex on social media, and a source told The Sun Online : "Steph has not been happy for some time about Jeremy going in to Ex On The Beach." Stephanie Davis has unfollowed her ex (Photo: Rex Features) Before the couple's supposed renunion, Steph didn't talk to her ex-boyfriend Jeremy McConnell for months – despite being pregnant with his baby. 
And today nearly two months after giving birth to their son Caben-Albi, Steph opened up about having the father of her child back in her life. 
"If someone told me a few months ago that Jeremy and I would be on speaking terms I would have laughed in their face," she told OK! magazine . 
But after becoming a mother, Steph has found it in her heart to forgive her ex. (Photo: jeremymcconnellcooke/Instagram) 
"I never thought that we would be able to forgive each other for what has gone on in the past, but having Caben around has changed everything. 
"We have both done a lot of growing up, we're not the same people we were and are trying our best to co-parent as much as we can in order to be good parents to our son." 
Jeremy recently moved from Ireland to Liverpool to be closer to Caben – but Steph admitted that although they're back on speaking terms, they're not officially back together just yet. 
"No we're not back together," she admitted. (Photo: jeremymcconnellcooke/Instagram) 
"We're just taking it day by day – I don't know what the future holds. Our priority at the present time is to provide what's best for Caben. 
"We'll always hold a special place in each other's hearts as Caben's parents, but for now we both have work commitments coming up that we need to concentrate on." 
But Steph revealed that the family had a very emotional reunion when Jeremy met his son for the first time. 
"He spent ages just looking at Caben and then he got very emotional and started welling up," she said. 
"I gave him a hug, but he was hiding his face from me so I wouldn't see him crying." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
